name: An Apple A Day Keeps The Doctor Away
name_original: An Apple A Day Keeps The Doctor Away
description:
An apple a day keeps the doctor away... they say

A game about the old saying. 

Protect your self and dont let the doctors get to you. 

This is an entry in Fireside Gamejam 2022. The Theme was - Protect - and I was really sick when making the game. 

Made primarily with the awesome Gdevelop
